name: Spaced out 2: From Mars with love
name_original: Spaced out 2: From Mars with love
description: BROUGHT BY OUR MOST POPULAR VR GAME  SPACEDOUT 2: FROM MARS WITH LOVE  IS NOW AVAILABLE on ITCH.io             YOU'VE BEEN PROMOTED TO BE THE ONLY DUMMY WILLING TO STAY ON MARS WHILE EVERYONE ELSE LEAVES.  HAVE FUN MESSING AROUND IN A WORLD OF YOUR OWN IN VR. INCLUDING NEW FUN WITH THE DUPLICATORANATOR TECH YOU CAN CLONE ROCKETS AND DRONES AND LOTS MORE!
